item.title: Who Can Get the New Covid Shot?
item.description: There’s a new Covid-19 vaccine, but it won’t be available to everyone. Here’s who can get the covid shot.

item.title: Nearly 1 in 2 Workers Feels Stuck. Here’s How to Change That
item.description: Almost 3 in 4 Gen-Z workers report low job satisfaction, but the problem affects age groups across the whole workforce.

item.description: Get ready for a price increase for your morning cup of Joe.

item.title: Cracker Barrel Is Sticking to Its Old Logo After All
item.description: The dining chain faced ample criticism about its recently unveiled rebrand.
